name: Lime Design System
description:
Lime Design System is a creative hypothetical work meant for personal use only. This project initiated as a visual design exercise and the creatorâ€™s attempt to learn more about design systems on the go.


The hypothetical Product for which the Design System is conceptualized is a platform for designers to have their portfolio, works at one place, and apply for jobs, and/ get freelance gigs thereby connecting with designer recruiters and clients respectively.


Hypothetical Project not for Commercial Use.
